item.title: 云数据创业公司 Eon 在最新一轮融资中估值飙升至 40 亿美元
item.description: 云数据管理初创公司 Eon 表示，它在 Gil Capital 领投的新一轮融资中筹集了 3 亿美元，其估值几乎增加了两倍，达到 40 亿美元。【原文：Cloud data-management startup Eon said it has raised $300 million in a new funding round led by Gil Capital and that its valuation has almost tripled to $4 billion.】

item.title: RTX 公司获得价值 16 亿美元的 F135 发动机维护合同
item.description: RTX 公司周二表示，该公司已获得一份价值 16 亿美元的 F135 发动机维护合同，该发动机为洛克希德-马丁公司的 F-35 战斗机提供动力。【原文：RTX said on Tuesday it has secured a $1.6 billion sustainment contract related to its F135 engines, which power variants of Lockheed Martin's F-35 fighter jets.】

item.title: Adobe Analytics称，在为期五天的假日购物期间，美国网络销售额激增至442亿美元
item.description: Adobe Analytics 的一份报告显示，美国购物者在 "网络星期一 "消费了 142.5 亿美元，将感恩节周末的网上销售总额推高至 442 亿美元，因为消费者对从小玩意到家庭必需品的各种优惠一抢而空。【原文：U.S. shoppers spent $14.25 billion on Cyber Monday, pushing total online sales over the Thanksgiving weekend to $44.2 billion, according to an Adobe Analytics report, as consumers lapped up offers on everything from gadgets to household essentials.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+成员国将根据新计划接受年度石油产能审计
item.description: 欧佩克+"消息人士称，从明年开始，"欧佩克+"成员国将对其石油生产能力进行年度评估，评估结果将在2027年使用，以确保该组织制定的产量配额更符合每个国家的实际能力。【原文：OPEC+ members will undergo an annual assessment of their oil production capacity starting next year for use in 2027, OPEC+ sources said, to ensure that the group sets output quotas that are more closely aligned with each country's real capacity.】

item.title: 迈克尔-戴尔和苏珊-戴尔将向 2500 万美国儿童的投资账户投入 250 美元
item.description: 迈克尔-戴尔（Michael Dell）和他的妻子苏珊-戴尔（Susan Dell）将向 2500 万美国儿童的投资账户各存入 250 美元，作为特朗普政府 "投资美国"（Invest America）倡议的一部分，他们将承诺提供 62.5 亿美元的慈善资金。【原文：Michael Dell and his wife Susan Dell will deposit $250 each in the investment accounts of 25 million American children, in a $6.25 billion philanthropic pledge as part of the Trump administration's Invest America initiative.】

item.title: 加速硬件仿真的软件公司 Vinci 募集到 3600 万美元资金
item.description: Startup Vinci 公司周二表示，它已筹集到 3600 万美元，用于资助其软件开发业务，该软件可通过显著加快芯片和其他硬件设计的模拟速度。【原文：Startup Vinci said on Tuesday it has raised $36 million to finance its business of building software that can speed chip and other hardware design by significantly accelerating the simulation of such devices.】

item.title: 亚马逊因Shein和Temu价格战削减欧洲卖家费用
item.description: 亚马逊正在削减向欧洲卖家收取的费用，以应对来自 Shein 和 Temu 等以低价销售服装、家居用品和小工具的市场的竞争。【原文：Amazon is cutting the fees it charges sellers in Europe as it responds to competition from marketplaces like Shein and Temu that sell clothes, homeware and gadgets at rock-bottom prices.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空在空客软件修改后恢复运营，标明运力受到影响
item.description: 美国低成本航空公司捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周二表示，该公司已经完成了上周空客召回A320和A321机队所需的软件更新，并已恢复正常运营。【原文：Low-cost U.S. carrier JetBlue Airways said on Tuesday it had completed the required software updates on its A320 and A321 fleet, in relation to Airbus' recall of the same last week, and had resumed normal operations.】

item.title: 人工智能融资潮来临，贝莱德转而看跌长期国债
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）周二表示，该机构转而看跌美国长期国债，并警告说，即将到来的人工智能相关融资浪潮可能会给美国借贷成本带来上升压力，并加剧对美国政府负债的担忧。【原文：The BlackRock Investment Institute said on Tuesday it is turning bearish on long-term U.S. Treasuries, warning a coming wave of AI-related financing could put upward pressure on U.S. borrowing costs and exacerbate worries over U.S. government indebtedness.】

item.title: 官员称瑞士可能需要习惯美国关税
item.description: 周二，在瑞士与欧盟达成关税协议以获得同等待遇后，瑞士一位高级贸易谈判代表被引述说，瑞士可能需要习惯美国的关税。【原文：Switzerland may need to get used to U.S. tariffs, a top Swiss trade negotiator was quoted as saying on Tuesday after the country reached a tariff deal to get parity with the European Union.】

item.title: 早间竞标更萧条的十二月
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家报道空中客车公司首席执行官研究最新问题对 12 月份的影响，11 月份 "疲软"。
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）周二告诉路透社记者，由于新发现的部分A320喷气机机身质量问题导致11月份的交付 "疲软"，该公司正在评估这一问题对年底交付的影响。【原文：Airbus is assessing the impact on year-end deliveries of a newly discovered fuselage quality issue on some of its A320 jets after it led to "weak" November handovers, CEO Guillaume Faury told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Lumexa Imaging 在美国 IPO 的目标估值高达 18.9 亿美元
item.description: 由 Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe 公司支持的 Lumexa Imaging 公司周二表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标估值将超过 18.9 亿美元。【原文：Lumexa Imaging is aiming for a valuation of more than $1.89 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, the Welsh, Carson, Anderson & Stowe-backed company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国制造电动汽车 11 月销量增长 9.9
item.description: 特斯拉 11 月份在中国生产的电动汽车销量同比增长 9.9%，这家美国汽车制造商正在努力应对中国和欧洲市场的激烈竞争。【原文：Tesla's China-made electric vehicle sales rose 9.9% in November from a year earlier, as the U.S. automaker grapples with intense competition in China and Europe.】

item.title: 德国反垄断机构测试苹果修订后的应用追踪规则是否符合竞争规则
item.description: 德国反垄断机构周二表示，正在评估苹果公司提出的解决方案，以解决对其应用程序跟踪透明框架（ATTF）的竞争担忧，并已启动市场测试，收集应用程序发布商、媒体协会、内容提供商和数据保护机构的反馈意见。【原文：Germany's antitrust authority said on Tuesday it is assessing solutions proposed by Apple to address competition concerns over its App Tracking Transparency Framework (ATTF) and has launched a market test to gather feedback from app publishers, media associations, content providers and data protection authorities.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Wealthfront 在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高 20.5 亿美元的估值
item.description: 自动化数字财富管理公司Wealthfront周二表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达20.5亿美元，成为投资者对金融科技公司上市青睐有加的最新验证。【原文：Automated digital wealth management firm Wealthfront is targeting a valuation of up to $2.05 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, it said on Tuesday, becoming the latest to test a trend of strong investor appetite for fintech listings.】

item.title: 市场酝酿美联储下一步行动，华尔街期货稳步上扬
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走高，在华尔街一周多来首次回调后企稳，投资者在等待新的通胀数据，该数据可能有助于为美联储即将做出的政策决定提供线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Tuesday, steadying after Wall Street's first pullback in more than a week, as investors braced for a fresh inflation reading that could help offer clues to the Federal Reserve's upcoming policy decisions.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国自动驾驶公司 Momenta 申请在香港上市
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，中国自动驾驶汽车开发商 Momenta 已秘密申请在香港首次公开募股。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving developer Momenta has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong initial public offering, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 联合国报告警告说，人工智能可能加剧富国与穷国之间的鸿沟
item.description: 联合国周二的一份报告称，人工智能可能会扩大发达国家与发展中国家之间的差距，并呼吁采取政策措施限制这种影响。【原文：Artificial Intelligence could widen gaps between developed and developing countries, a U.N. report said on Tuesday, calling for policy measures to limit the impact.】

item.title: 台湾在台积电商业机密案中起诉东京电子部门
item.description: 台湾检方周二表示，在一名前员工因窃取芯片制造商台积电的商业机密而被起诉后，他们已指控东京电子台湾分公司违反了《国家安全法》和《商业机密法》。【原文：Taiwan prosecutors said on Tuesday they had charged Tokyo Electron's Taiwan unit with violating the National Security Act and the Trade Secrets Act after a former employee was indicted for stealing trade secrets from chipmaker TSMC .】

item.title: 普拉达经过漫长的求爱过程后完成了对范思哲的收购
item.description: 普拉达（Prada）周二表示，它已经完成了对较小的意大利竞争对手范思哲（Versace）的收购。【原文：Prada said on Tuesday it had completed the acquisition of smaller Italian rival Versace, a brand the luxury group said it had long coveted.】

item.title: 经合组织称，关税、人工智能热潮可能考验全球经济增长的韧性
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）表示，由于人工智能投资热潮有助于抵消美国提高关税带来的部分冲击，全球经济增长势头好于预期，并上调了对一些主要经济体的展望。【原文：Global growth is holding up better than expected as an artificial intelligence investment boom helps offset some of the shock from U.S. tariff hikes, the OECD said, nudging up its outlook for some major economies.】

item.title: 欧洲银行集团宣布成立名为 qivalis 的欧元稳定币公司
item.description: 包括荷兰国际集团（ING）、意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）和法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）在内的 10 家欧洲银行组成了一个财团，准备推出一种与欧元挂钩的稳定币，希望此举能对抗美国在数字支付领域的主导地位。【原文：A group of 10 European banks, including heavyweights ING , UniCredit and BNP Paribas , have formed a consortium to launch a euro-pegged stablecoin, in a move they hope will counter U.S. dominance in digital payments.】

item.title: 路易威登掌门人皮特罗-贝卡里（Pietro Beccari）将出任路威酩轩集团时装部门首席执行官
item.description: 法国奢侈品巨头路易威登集团周二表示，路易威登首席执行官皮特罗-贝卡里（Pietro Beccari）已被任命为路威酩轩集团时装部门的首席执行官。【原文：Louis Vuitton CEO Pietro Beccari has been appointed as the chief executive of LVMH's fashion division, the French luxury giant said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟法院裁定荷兰法院可受理针对苹果应用程序商店的反垄断案件
item.description: 欧盟法院周二裁定，荷兰法庭对两家当地基金会起诉苹果公司应用程序商店涉嫌反竞争行为一案拥有管辖权。【原文：The Court of Justice of the European Union on Tuesday ruled the Dutch tribunals have jurisdiction over a case brought against Apple's App Store by two local foundations over alleged anticompetitive conduct.】

item.title: 解说员：什么是印度具有政治争议的 Sanchar Saathi 网络安全应用程序？
item.description: 印度要求智能手机制造商在所有新设备上预装一个国有网络安全应用程序的规定引发了一场政治风暴，加剧了人们对世界上人口最多的国家政府进行窥探的担忧。【原文：India's mandate requiring smartphone makers to preload a state-owned cyber safety app on all new devices has triggered a political firestorm, fanning fears of government snooping in the world's most populous nation.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，旅游预订平台 Klook 将推迟至 2026 年初在美国上市
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，在线旅游平台 Klook 计划明年初在美国上市。【原文：Online travel platform Klook plans to list in the US early next year, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道：埃克森正在与伊拉克商谈收购卢克石油公司在西古尔奈 2 号巨型油田的股份
item.description: 五位直接了解此事的伊拉克官方消息人士告诉路透社，埃克森美孚已与伊拉克石油部接洽，表示有意购买俄罗斯卢克石油公司在巨型西古尔奈 2 号油田的多数股份。【原文：Exxon Mobil has approached the Iraqi oil ministry to express its interest in buying Russian firm Lukoil's majority stake in the giant West Qurna 2 oilfield, five Iraqi official sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道：埃克森美孚就收购卢克石油西古尔奈油田股份一事与伊拉克接触
item.description: 五位直接了解此事的伊拉克官方消息人士告诉路透社，埃克森美孚已与伊拉克石油部接洽，表示有意购买俄罗斯卢克石油公司在巨型西古尔奈 2 号油田的多数股份。【原文：Exxon Mobil has approached the Iraqi oil ministry to express its interest in buying Russian firm Lukoil's majority stake in the giant West Qurna 2 oilfield, five Iraqi official sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国投资者 Saba 阻止 Baillie Gifford 和爱丁堡合并
item.description: 英国 Baillie Gifford 美国增长信托公司周二表示，该公司与同行爱丁堡全球投资信托公司的合并计划已被其第一大股东、美国激进投资者萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）阻止。【原文：Britain's Baillie Gifford US Growth Trust said on Tuesday that the company's proposed merger with peer Edinburgh Worldwide Investment Trust has been blocked by U.S. activist investor Saba Capital Management, its top shareholder.】
